Sentencas: This work involves a method for modeling the now distribution in the stack of a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Issues related to the modeling of solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Towards this end, a three dimensional modeling of the flow through a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) stack was carried out using the CFD analysis.
Titulo: Issues related to the modeling of solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: This paper examines the efficacy of using cold flow analysis to describe the flow through a SOFC stack.
Titulo: Issues related to the modeling of solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: It brings out the relative importance of temperature effect and the mass transfer effect on the SOFC manifold design.
Titulo: Issues related to the modeling of solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Another feature of this study is to utilize statistical tools to ascertain the extent of uniform flow through a stack.
Titulo: Issues related to the modeling of solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The results showed that the cold now analysis of flow through SOFC might not lead to correct manifold designs.
Titulo: Issues related to the modeling of solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The results of the numerical calculations also indicated that the mass transfer across membrane was essential to correctly describe the cathode flow, while only temperature effects were sufficient to describe the anode flow in a SOFC.
Titulo: Issues related to the modeling of solid oxide fuel cell stacks
